name: Aim Trainer - Shooting Range
description:
Aim Trainer - Shooting Range is a casual shooting game that includes a variety of exciting and fun game modes and a extensive weapon upgrade system. Train your shooting skills, collect different types of weapons, and become an excellent shooter elite!

Experience the thrill of precision marksmanship, hone your shooting skills, aim for perfection, and hit your targets dead center!


Step into the great outdoors and embrace the explosive power of the shotgun!


Prepare for long-range dominance as you venture into the open expanse of our virtual world!


Embark on an epic hunting adventure in the wild, where time slows down as your bullet sails towards your prey!


Get ready for heart-pounding shotgun action in the great outdoors. Your first shot may miss, but the second shot is right on target!


Step into the dimly lit indoor shooting range and test your reflexes as glass bottles pop up one by one!

Game features:


  • Abundant task levels: Train and improve your shooting skills step by step!
  • Various of weapons: Different kinds of weapons bring different shooting experiences! Upgrade your weapons to get more powerful equipment!
  • Realistic shooting experience: Physics-based shooting simulation that recreates a real-world, authentic shooting experience!
  • Multiple game modes: Contains training levels, clay pigeon shooting, hunting, and other game modes, a variety of different shooting scenarios simulation!
  • Hunting mode: Realistic hunting scenario simulation, conquer the wild animals in the forest with a sniper rifle!
  • Offline Games: Play a few rounds anywhere, anytime!

The game mainly trains three types of weapons: pistols, shotguns, and sniper rifles.
Pistol - Train the reaction speed, aiming speed, and the rapid-fire ability for close-range shooting.
Shotgun - Training accuracy and speed of aiming at medium distance.
Sniper - Training ultra-long-range shooting accuracy and aiming ability.

Skeet Shooting and Trap Shooting: Simulate skeet shooting to train your reaction speed and shooting accuracy.
Hunting Mode: Realistic simulation of the forest ecological environment, animals will avoid each other, attack, foraging. You use a sniper rifle to survive in the forest, the longer you survive, the more rare species you will encounter and the more difficult challenges you will face. Try to survive in the forest to the end!

Come and download the game, train your shooting skills and experience the realistic shooting environment!
